name: Baccarat - The Game - Petit Corona
additionalNotes: A handmade long filler, Baccarat Havana the Game Cigars are the highest quality cigar available in its field and price range. The mild bodied Baccarat cigar boasts a light brown Connecticut wrapper with a sweetened tip that is particular to the Havana the Game type and perfect for the beginning smoker. The Baccarat Havana Section at The Game have a Mexican Dulce Binder and the filler is Honduran Habano grown in the Jamastran Valley.
